Title: Other Things You Could Be Doing
Writer: Stephen Falk (created by), Stephen Falk, Eva Anderson (executive story editor), Alison Bennett (executive story editor)
Actors: Chris Geere, Aya Cash, Desmin Borges, Kether Donohue
Plot: Gretchen's depression comes to a head, forcing Jimmy to make a tough choice. Lindsay finally lets Paul go. Edgar has his improv graduation show.
